meanings.definition: Common people or the lower social classes in ancient Rome.
meanings.sent1: The plebeians worked hard in the fields.
meanings.sent2: The plebeians lived in simple houses.
meanings.sent3: The plebeians enjoyed a feast together.
meanings.sent4: The plebeians were the backbone of society.
meanings.sent5: The plebeians were respected for their hard work.

meanings.definition: A member of the common people in ancient Rome.
meanings.sent1: A plebeian farmer tended to his crops.
meanings.sent2: The plebeian attended the public assembly.
meanings.sent3: The plebeian told a funny joke.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a plebeian among the elite.

meanings.definition: A person of low social status.
meanings.sent1: The kind-hearted plebeian helped his neighbors.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a plebeian in the fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The plebeian found joy in simple pleasures.
meanings.sent4: He rose from plebeian origins to become a leader.
meanings.sent5: The plebeian dreamt of a better life.
